chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
x: nat -> nat

Goal:
nat

Premises:
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
in_int = fun p q r : nat => p <= r < q : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments in_int (_ _ _)%nat_scope
tail_mult = fun n m : nat => mult_acc 0 m n : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments tail_mult (_ _)%nat_scope
prod = fun (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat) => nat_rec (fun _ : nat => nat) 1 (fun n0 Hrecn : nat => x n0 * Hrecn) n : nat -> (nat -> nat) -> nat Arguments prod _%nat_scope _%function_scope
Nat.lcm = fun a b : nat => a * (b / Nat.gcd a b) : nat -> nat -> nat Arguments Nat.lcm (_ _)%nat_scope
neq = fun x y : nat => x <> y : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments neq (_ _)%nat_scope
Nat.Bezout = fun n m p : nat => exists a b : nat, a * n = p + b * m : nat -> nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.Bezout (_ _ _)%nat_scope
mult_acc = fix mult_acc (s m n : nat) {struct n} : nat := match n with | 0 => s | S p => mult_acc (tail_plus m s) m p end : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat Arguments mult_acc (_ _ _)%nat_scope
Nat.divide = fun x y : nat => exists z : nat, y = z * x : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments Nat.divide (_ _)%nat_scope
Fin.FS_inj : forall x0 y : Fin.t ?n, Fin.FS x0 = Fin.FS y -> x0 = y where ?n : [n : nat x : nat -> nat |- nat]
Fin.caseS' : forall (p : Fin.t (S ?n)) (P : Fin.t (S ?n) -> Type), P Fin.F1 -> (forall p0 : Fin.t ?n, P (Fin.FS p0)) -> P p where ?n : [n : nat x : nat -> nat |- nat]
between_ind : forall (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) (P0 : nat -> Prop), P0 k -> (forall l : nat, between P k l -> P0 l -> P l -> P0 (S l)) -> forall n : nat, between P k n -> P0 n
between_sind : forall (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) (P0 : nat -> SProp), P0 k -> (forall l : nat, between P k l -> P0 l -> P l -> P0 (S l)) -> forall n : nat, between P k n -> P0 n
fact = fix fact (n : nat) : nat := match n with | 0 => 1 | S n0 => S n0 * fact n0 end : nat -> nat Arguments fact _%nat_scope
RingMicromega.PsatzIn : forall C : Type, nat -> RingMicromega.Psatz C
exists_between_ind : forall (Q : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), (forall l : nat, exists_between Q k l -> P l -> P (S l)) -> (forall l : nat, k <= l -> Q l -> P (S l)) -> forall n : nat, exists_between Q k n -> P n
eq_nat_elim : forall (n : nat) (P : nat -> Prop), P n -> forall m : nat, eq_nat n m -> P m
Inductive between (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) : nat -> Prop := bet_emp : between P k k | bet_S : forall l : nat, between P k l -> P l -> between P k (S l) Arguments between _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments bet_emp _%function_scope _%nat_scope Arguments bet_S _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope
exists_le_S : forall (Q : nat -> Prop) (k l : nat), exists_between Q k l -> S k <= l
exists_S_le : forall (Q : nat -> Prop) (k l : nat), exists_between Q k (S l) -> k <= l
bet_emp : forall (P : nat -> Prop) (k : nat), between P k k
EnvRing.PNSubst : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> EnvRing.Pol C -> EnvRing.Mon -> EnvRing.Pol C -> nat -> option (EnvRing.Pol C)
EnvRing.PSubstL1 : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> EnvRing.Pol C -> list (EnvRing.Mon * EnvRing.Pol C) -> nat -> EnvRing.Pol C
Inductive exists_between (Q : nat -> Prop) (k : nat) : nat -> Prop := exists_S : forall l : nat, exists_between Q k l -> exists_between Q k (S l) | exists_le : forall l : nat, k <= l -> Q l -> exists_between Q k (S l) Arguments exists_between _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments exists_S _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope Arguments exists_le _%function_scope (_ _)%nat_scope
EnvRing.PSubstL : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> EnvRing.Pol C -> list (EnvRing.Mon * EnvRing.Pol C) -> nat -> option (EnvRing.Pol C)
Nat.eqf = fun f g : nat -> bool => forall n : nat, f n = g n : (nat -> bool) -> (nat -> bool) -> Prop Arguments Nat.eqf (_ _)%function_scope
Nat.case_analysis : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
prodBig1 : forall (n : nat) (x : nat -> nat), (forall z : nat, z < n -> x z > 0) -> prod n x > 0
Nat.bi_induction : forall A : nat -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> A 0 -> (forall n : nat, A n <-> A (S n)) -> forall n : nat, A n
Ring_polynom.PNSubst : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> C -> C * C) -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> C * Ring_polynom.Mon -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> nat -> option (Ring_polynom.Pol C)
Ring_polynom.PSubstL1 : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> C -> C * C) -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> list (C * Ring_polynom.Mon * Ring_polynom.Pol C) -> nat -> Ring_polynom.Pol C
Ring_polynom.PSubstL : forall C : Type, C -> C -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> C) -> (C -> C -> bool) -> (C -> C -> C * C) -> Ring_polynom.Pol C -> list (C * Ring_polynom.Mon * Ring_polynom.Pol C) -> nat -> option (Ring_polynom.Pol C)
Nat.min_monotone : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le le) f -> forall x y : nat, Nat.min (f x) (f y) = f (Nat.min x y)
Nat.max_mono : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le le) f -> forall x y : nat, Nat.max (f x) (f y) = f (Nat.max x y)
Nat.min_mono : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le le) f -> forall x y : nat, Nat.min (f x) (f y) = f (Nat.min x y)
eq_nat = fix eq_nat (n m : nat) {struct n} : Prop := match n with | 0 => match m with | 0 => True | S _ => False end | S n1 => match m with | 0 => False | S m1 => eq_nat n1 m1 end end : nat -> nat -> Prop Arguments eq_nat (_ _)%nat_scope
Inductive t (A : Type) : nat -> Type := nil : VectorDef.t A 0 | cons : A -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t A n -> VectorDef.t A (S n) Arguments VectorDef.t _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments VectorDef.nil _%type_scope Arguments VectorDef.cons _%type_scope _ _%nat_scope
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) Arguments Fin.t _%nat_scope Arguments Fin.F1 {n}%nat_scope Arguments Fin.FS {n}%nat_scope
BinPosDef.Pos.of_succ_nat = fix of_succ_nat (n : nat) : positive := match n with | 0 => 1%positive | S x => BinPosDef.Pos.succ (of_succ_nat x) end : nat -> positive Arguments BinPosDef.Pos.of_succ_nat _%nat_scope
Inductive Psatz (C : Type) : Type := PsatzIn : nat -> RingMicromega.Psatz C | PsatzSquare : RingMicromega.PolC C -> RingMicromega.Psatz C | PsatzMulC : RingMicromega.PolC C -> RingMicromega.Psatz C -> RingMicromega.Psatz C | PsatzMulE : RingMicromega.Psatz C -> RingMicromega.Psatz C ->...-> RingMicromega.Psatz C | PsatzZ : RingMicromega.Psatz C Arguments RingMicromega.Psatz _%type_scope Arguments RingMicromega.PsatzIn _%type_scope _%nat_scope Arguments RingMicromega.PsatzSquare [C]%type_scope Arguments RingMicromega.PsatzMulC [C]%type_scope Arguments RingMicromega.PsatzMulE [C]%type_scope Arguments RingMicromega.PsatzAdd [C]%type_scope Arguments RingMicromega.PsatzC [C]%type_scope Arguments RingMicromega.PsatzZ _%type_scope
PeanoNat.Nat.div_wd_obligation_1 = fun (x y : nat) (H : x = y) (x0 y0 : nat) (H0 : x0 = y0) => eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => x / x1 = y / y0) (eq_ind_r (fun x1 : nat => x1 / y0 = y / y0) eq_refl H) H0 : Morphisms.respectful eq (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) Nat.div Nat.div
